infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: CalorieTracker needs access to your microphone to record voice descriptions of your meals for easy food logging.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: CalorieTracker needs access to your camera to take photos of your meals for food logging.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: CalorieTracker needs access to your photo library to select meal photos for food logging.

plugins.microphonePermission: CalorieTracker needs access to your microphone to record voice descriptions of your meals for easy food logging.
